title: Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: That was a SAS exam rather than an interview! There were three interviewer of whom one held the similar position.  The interview took 45 min. I think the interviewer were not profetional.
Interview Questions: They asked about  "all"  prefered and required qualifications  mentioned in the advertisement and job description.  All question were practical . How do you merge databases when you have several key variables? How do you call ...

title: Health Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Spoke with three different people on my interview process and they were all friendly. It was a very straight to the point interview for me and I was told it would take up to an hour and the total time for me was just under 20 minutes. They asked me questions mostly pertaining to how my skills would best fit their vacancy. Did not get too personal in this interview, it stayed straight to the point.
Interview Questions: Tell me how your experience and background will fit this role.

title: Health Education Program Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the Health Education Program Coordinator in April and I was contacted to interview in June. I drove 2 hrs from NYC to get to Albany, NY only to not get the job. The hiring managers should have communicated with me about their decision process, but they never responded to any of my e-mails. I really wish I knew why they did not select me and I am still very discouraged.
Interview Questions: How do you support capacity building skills for your providers?

title: Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: I have interviewed for the position twice, same people in the panel each time. Legitimately felt more professional than the panel (based on appearances and demeanors), and never got a call back. Waste of time.
Interview Questions: Typical questions such as why would you be a good fit, describe strengths, etc

title: Intern - Hourly Interview
Interview Descriptions: I had a telephonic interview. The interview lasted for 45 minutes. It was a resume walkthrough. The interviewer asked approach based questions. Simple Java questions, debugging related questions, restful apis using apache jersey, http protocols based questions. How to handle a service based on particular response code?
Interview Questions: RESTful web services, Basic Java Questions, HTTP Protocols, Database related questions

title: Program Research Specialist II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: It was an hour interview. Basic questions on the projects that you have done using your statistical knowledge and tools. They work with SAS so be ready to quote examples. Just be confident. Easy interview.
Interview Questions:
Describe how have you used SAS? 

How efficient are you with PowerPoint?
Describe your projects .

title: Senior Computer Programmer/Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research (Menands, NY) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Called for onsite interview at NYSDOH. There were three interviewers. Asked technical questions plus some general questions at the end. Interview last about an hour. Overall pleasant experience.
Interview Questions: Tell your experience in Application development.

title: Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Health Research (Buffalo, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview followed by a 30 minute writing sample. Panelists were required to take notes on a grid while I answered questions so it was a little awkward and non-conversational 3+ months before rejection by mail.

title: Program Research Specialist II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: It is an on-site interview at Corning tower, Albany NY. 3 interviewers，8 questions. Score system was used. The atmosphere was good, but I am not a native speaker and my oral English might be a problem.
Interview Questions: 1. your oral and written experience in English.

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: I met with two people who both worked in Human Resources. They were friendly and approachable and asked basic questions related to past duties, and skill levels.   It was a casual interview.
Interview Questions: How familiar are you with Excel?

title: Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: pretty standard interview process the interviewer ask your background experience and there is no specific technique questions. if your back experience matches their requirement then you may have a chance to get the job

title: Laboratory Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview from a secretary asking me to come in for a in person. The interview was straightforward except for the part where she didn't show me the lab. Had I seen it I probably wouldn't have accepted the job.
Interview Questions: what do you want to do in the future?

title: Assistant Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly people. Interview process was very methodical.Hiring process is very organised and clear. Looks like they wanted to fill in the position relatively soon.Very basic questions.Friendly atmosphere.Good co workers. Very good benefits. grant funded positions.good working environment.I applied online and got a phone call for onsite interview.

title: Assistant Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Health Research (Albany, NY) in Aug 2010
Interview Descriptions: Basic questions about the technique skills
